languages.text: "Быть может, когда мы остановимся передохнуть в безопасном месте, ты найдешь время меня выслушать. А теперь идем".
"Perhaps when we stop to rest in a place of quiet, you will find time to hear me. But for now, we must go."
languages.original_text: "Быть может, когда мы остановимся передохнуть в безопасном месте, ты найдешь время меня выслушать. А теперь идем".

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps when we stop to rest in a place of quiet, you will find time to hear me. But for now, we must go."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps when we stop to rest in a place of quiet, you will find time to hear me. But for now, we must go."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps when we stop to rest in a place of quiet, you will find time to hear me. But for now, we must go."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps when we stop to rest in a place of quiet, you will find time to hear me. But for now, we must go."

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps when we stop to rest in a place of quiet, you will find time to hear me. But for now, we must go."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps when we stop to rest in a place of quiet, you will find time to hear me. But for now, we must go."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「静かな場所で休めれば、私の話を聞く時間も持てるだろう。でも、今は行かなければ」
languages.original_text: "Perhaps when we stop to rest in a place of quiet, you will find time to hear me. But for now, we must go."

traits.locale_text: 「静かな場所で休めれば、私の話を聞く時間も持てるだろう。でも、今は行かなければ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “等我们找到安静的地方停下来休息时候，我再和你好好谈谈吧。至于现在，我们必须离开了。”
languages.original_text: "Perhaps when we stop to rest in a place of quiet, you will find time to hear me. But for now, we must go."

traits.locale_text: “等我们找到安静的地方停下来休息时候，我再和你好好谈谈吧。至于现在，我们必须离开了。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Quizá cuando nos detengamos a descansar en un lugar tranquilo encuentres tiempo para escucharme. Pero, por ahora, debemos irnos».
languages.original_text: "Perhaps when we stop to rest in a place of quiet, you will find time to hear me. But for now, we must go."

traits.locale_text: «Quizá cuando nos detengamos a descansar en un lugar tranquilo encuentres tiempo para escucharme. Pero, por ahora, debemos irnos».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Vielleicht findet Ihr Zeit, sie Euch anzuhören, wenn wir einmal an einem ruhigen Ort rasten. Nun aber müssen wir gehen."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps when we stop to rest in a place of quiet, you will find time to hear me. But for now, we must go."

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht findet Ihr Zeit, sie Euch anzuhören, wenn wir einmal an einem ruhigen Ort rasten. Nun aber müssen wir gehen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Peut-être qu'une fois au calme, vous trouverez le temps d'entendre ce que j'ai à dire. Mais pour le moment, nous devons partir. »
languages.original_text: "Perhaps when we stop to rest in a place of quiet, you will find time to hear me. But for now, we must go."

traits.locale_text: « Peut-être qu'une fois au calme, vous trouverez le temps d'entendre ce que j'ai à dire. Mais pour le moment, nous devons partir. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Dinlenmek için sakin bir yerde durduğumuzda belki beni dinlemeye vakit ayırırsın. Şimdi gitmemiz gerek."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps when we stop to rest in a place of quiet, you will find time to hear me. But for now, we must go."

traits.locale_text: "Dinlenmek için sessiz bir yerde durduğumuzda belki beni dinlemeye vakit ayırırsın. Ancak şimdilik gitmemiz gerek."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
